name: PhiNesse Brush Medium Powder Brush 2
short_description: A medium, dome-shaped, dense brush for applying powders. This brush is particularly soft for generous, perfectly even application. Its thickness and density allow it to offer moderate-to-high coverage, and the long handle allows a grip farther from the tuft for increased movement when applying. It features both straight and wavy fibers, and can be used with loose and compact powders.
long_description: A medium, dome-shaped, dense brush for applying powders. This brush is particularly soft for generous, perfectly even application. Its thickness and density allow it to offer moderate-to-high coverage, and the long handle allows a grip farther from the tuft for increased movement when applying. It features both straight and wavy fibers, and can be used with loose and compact powders.
